dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT a.OD_OB_SKU , a.OD_PB_ITEM_DESC , a.OD_OB_DEPT_ID , a.OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME , a.OD_PB_RESOURCE_NUMBER , a.OD_PB_STORE_NUMBER , a.OD_OB_REG_DATE , a.OD_PB_COMMENTS , a.creation_date , apps.xx_qa_pos_pkg.xx_get_dept(a.od_ob_dept_id) dept_name FROM apps.q_od_ob_pos_v a WHERE a.od_ob_sku=NVL(:p_sku,od_ob_sku) AND a.od_pb_comments LIKE '%'||:p_comments||'%' AND NVL(a.od_ob_dept_id,-1)=NVL(:p_dept,NVL(a.od_ob_dept_id,-1)) AND NVL(a.od_pb_resource_number,'X')=NVL(:p_associate,NVL(a.od_pb_resource_number,'X')) AND NVL(a.od_pb_store_number,'X')=NVL(:p_store,NVL(a.od_pb_store_number,'X')) AND ( TRUNC(a.creation_date) BETWEEN TRUNC(apps.fnd_conc_date.string_to_date(NVL(:p_from_date,a.creation_date))) AND TRUNC(apps.fnd_conc_date.string_to_date(NVL(:p_to_date,a.creation_date))) ) AND ( TRUNC(a.od_ob_reg_date) BETWEEN TRUNC(apps.fnd_conc_date.string_to_date(NVL(:p_from_txn_date,a.od_ob_reg_date))) AND TRUNC(apps.fnd_conc_date.string_to_date(NVL(:p_to_txn_date,a.od_ob_reg_date))) ) ORDER BY creation_date
